scripts.clone-gstwebrtc-api: git clone --no-checkout https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/gstreamer/gst-plugins-rs.git && cd gst-plugins-rs && git sparse-checkout init && git sparse-checkout set net/webrtc/gstwebrtc-api && git checkout
scripts.pull-gstwebrtc-api: [ -d gst-plugins-rs ] && (cd gst-plugins-rs && git pull) || bun run clone-gstwebrtc-api
scripts.build-gstwebrtc-api: bun run pull-gstwebrtc-api && cd gst-plugins-rs/net/webrtc/gstwebrtc-api && bun install
